message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of constructing MDS vector codes with small sub-packetization level and near-optimal repair bandwidth, which is a problem in information theory (cs.IT) and has applications in distributed storage systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses linear codes over a base field, which falls under the category of coding theory (cs.SI). The repair bandwidth is a measure of communication, which is a topic in networking (cs.NI) and the paper mentions the cut-set bound, which is a concept in network coding (cs.CC).
